name: selfCARE
description:
This is a simple puzzle game where you have to connect the matching shapes. It was made with a minimalistic art style and hopefully smoothing music, in the hope of being a relaxing experience. 

The controls are simple: click on a shape to start a line, click again to stop tracing it, and click on the line to delete it. The level is completed when all dots are connected.

I would recommend playing in fullscreen mode. There are 16 levels and about 10 min of soundtrack, so if you finish before the end, sit back relax and take a moment to breath :)
